entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who needs sleep and is worried about his wand. He asks Hermione to mend it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a character in the story who tries to convince Harry to rest, but eventually agrees to help him mend his wand.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: The wand is an object that belongs to Harry and is nearly severed in two. It is made of holly and phoenix feather.

relationships.description: Harry owns the wand, which he asks Hermione to mend when it is broken.
Hermione helps Harry mend his wand by casting the 'Reparo' spell.
